ast.name: puzzleCam
ast.comment:
Simple Camera-, Picture Puzzle.

Select: MODE & MATRIX.
camera or library / 3x4, 4x5, 5x6. App cuts the Picture into tiny squares and mixes their order. Drag or Tab the pieces, to get back to Original. Tab two pieces to swap their Position. V2.0 adds tapped sorting, solves the hidden pieces Problem.
V2.1 fixes problem with TD 2.10

decls.name: tap sprite in cam pic menu

body.text: Input x, y Output: x, y Matrix konform
